resources.string: Press on a plot to view its plants/info\nLong press on a plot to edit its shape\nDrag the screen to pan the garden

Double tap screen to add points to shape
Drag a point to move it around
Long press on a point to delete it
The last dotted line will be added for you
Drag the edited plot to move it around\nDrag the dotted circle to rotate the plot\nDrag the square in bottom right corner of plot to resize it
Press the name to go to the encyclopedia.\nEnter your entry in the text box.\nPress "Post Entry" to save your entry.
Set a password and give it to fellow gardeners so they can find and view this garden using the Find existing garden button on the start screen
Leave the password blank to let anyone view this garden
